text: Kundi Paihama (9 December 1944 â€“ 24 July 2020) was an Angolan politician. He was Angola's Minister of Defense from 2002 to 2010. He was also a member of the National Assembly between 2018 to 2020. Paihama died in a private hospital in Luanda, Angola on 24 July 2020, aged 75. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Angolan politicians
title: Kundi Paihama
